contextKeys.Name: s3:DataAccessPointArn

contextKeys.Name: s3:x-amz-copy-source
contextKeys.Description: Enables you to restrict the copy source to a specific bucket, a specific folder in the bucket, or a specific object in a bucket.

contextKeys.Name: s3:object-lock-legal-hold
contextKeys.Description: Enables enforcement of the specified object legal hold status

contextKeys.Description: Enables you to require specific access permissions when uploading an object.

contextKeys.Name: s3:object-lock-remaining-retention-days
contextKeys.Description: Enables enforcement of an object relative to the remaining retention days

contextKeys.Name: s3:x-amz-server-side-encryption
contextKeys.Description: Enables you to require the user to specify this header in the request to ensure that objects the user uploads are encrypted when they are saved.
